thread.title: HILLARY CALLAHAN
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by HILLARY CALLAHAN

author: HILLARY CALLAHAN
title: HILLARY CALLAHAN
text: Experience in store wasn't helpful. Asked for help 3 different times and was approached rudely by all three. Love the set i've purchased but have chosen to purchase online after driving 45 minutes to get to the store to not have to talk with the customer service options they have in store. Definitely worth an online buy more than an in store experience.
